environment: the same forest now shrouded in cold blue moonlight and shadow

npc.name: The Narrator
dialogue: As you delve deeper into The Eternal Night, even the shadows tremble at your approach.
The Shade whispers your name, its icy breath echoing through the cavernous darkness, beckoning you to your final challenge.
Two guardians remain, their eyes ablaze with vengeance for their fallen comrade. They will not falter until The Shade's will is done.

lore.title: The Eternal Night
lore.content: Thornback's death has weakened the realm, but the prison still holds. Night descends - not natural darkness, but the domain of The Shade, Guardian of Shadows. This spirit was once a prisoner like you, consumed by despair and transformed into a jailer. It knows your fear. Two guardians remain between you and freedom.
